001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.NavigableMap;
006import java.util.SequencedMap;
007import java.util.TreeMap;
008import java.util.stream.Stream;
009
010import static java.util.function.Function.identity;
011import static java.util.stream.Collectors.counting;
012import static java.util.stream.Collectors.groupingBy;
013import static java.util.stream.Collectors.summingInt;
014
015/**
016 * Utility-Class to build a counting-map from the {@link Stream} of any objects
017 * that have properly implemented {@link Object#equals(Object)} and {@link Object#hashCode()}
018 * (and {@link Comparable#compareTo(Object) for sorted counting-maps}).
019 */
020public class CountingUtils {
021
022    /**
023     * @param valuesStream a stream of elements of type {@code <V>}
024     * @return a counting-map of type {@code Map<V,Long>}
025     * @param <V> the type of elements
026     */
027    public static <V> Map<V, Long> countingMapLong(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
028        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), counting()));
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * @param valuesStream a stream of elements of type {@code <V>}
033     * @return a counting-map of type {@code Map<V,Integer>}
034     * @param <V> the type of elements
035     */
036    public static <V> Map<V, Integer> countingMap(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
037        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), summingInt(v -> 1)));
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * @param valuesStream a stream of elements of type {@code <V>}
042     * @return a <b>sorted</b> counting-map of type {@code Map<V,Integer>}
043     * @param <V> the type of elements (expected to implement {@link Comparable})
044     */
045    public static <V> NavigableMap<V, Integer> countingSortedMap(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
046        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), TreeMap::new, summingInt(v -> 1)));
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Getting the counting-map, where the order of elements corresponds to the first occurrence of value.
051     *
052     * @param valuesStream a stream of elements of type {@code <V>}
053     * @return a <b>sorted</b> counting-map of type {@code Map<V,Integer>}
054     * @param <V> the type of elements (expected to implement {@link Comparable})
055     */
056    public static <V> SequencedMap<V, Integer> countingLinkedMap(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
057        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), LinkedHashMap::new, summingInt(v -> 1)));
058    }
059
060    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
061
062    private CountingUtils() {
063        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
064        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
065    }
066}
